about_the_game:
Hordes of Vampires & Their Masters

Take on relentless bloodthirsty vampires and their powerful shadow masters in intense combat. Battle cultists, androids, mercenaries, and other deadly foes along the way.

Sci-Fi Arsenal & Vampiric Powers

Mix and match two unique playstyles – sci-fi guns and vampiric abilities, both with deep upgrade trees. Customize your combat experience and dominate enemies your way.

Immersive Story & Environments

Step into the boots of a SpecOps contractor stranded on a threatened distant colony. Uncover the mysteries of a sinister cult and decide the fate of an entire planet.

Challenging Boss Fights

Face off against unforgettable antagonists who gradually turn against you as the story unfolds. Every battle is a test of skill, strategy, and survival.

Intense Action

Adrenaline-fueled cinematic moments keep the blood pumping. Face off against bloodthirsty vampires and their powerful masters in fast-paced, action-packed storyline.

Diverse Locations

Explore expansive, richly detailed environments with full freedom of movement – venture through massive industrial complexes, Martian landscape quarries, towering skyscrapers, and eerie research facilities with occult influences.

A Story That Shapes Your Fate

As Ron Adams, a SpecOps contractor, you'll forge alliances, face deadly foes, and determine the fate of those around you. Every decision carves your destiny and shapes the future of the planet. Will you remain human or embrace the dark side?

Standalone PC-quality VR Graphics

Immerse yourself in highly optimized, PC-quality visuals on a standalone VR device – delivering a high-fidelity experience with no external hardware required.

Take on relentless bloodthirsty vampires and their powerful shadow masters in intense combat. Battle cultists, androids, mercenaries, and other deadly foes along the way.

name: Dixotomia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 and higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470 and higher
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X and higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480 and higher
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: Dixotomia is a VR shooter in a world of a sci-fi dystopia. Become a SpecOps contractor, fight vampire cult and its vile bosses. Experience immersive action with brutal guns and vampiric abilities. Can you uncover dark secrets of a distant planet and return back unchanged?
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
